text: The important thing to note here is that Todd's name was originally Mr. Squirrel.

text: I think his full name is Todd T. Squirrel, isn't it?

name: nathanielperson
text: It's actually Todd Todd Todd Todd Todd T. Squirrel . His parents thought that once you've found a good name you really need to make it count.

text: The important thing to note here is that Todd once commanded respect from someone.

text: Alt text:"We're talking President's Day off. Work on the new house and all."

text: Taking, but yes. Lazy bastards. Nobody gets President's Day off in my household.
